description_html: The ‘Sheer Genius’ Collection boasts over 100 light and airy deluxe sheers in patterns, colors and textures ranging from linen-like soft hands to metallic accents and stripes. Featuring 118” widths, the Sheer Genius Collection meets all contract industry hospitality standards and NFPA 701. Design your hospitality guestroom with the Sheer Genius Collection from Fabric Innovations.
